org.minijson.builder.partial

Interface MixedJsonBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMixedJsonBuilder, MiniMixedBuilder, SimpleMixedJsonBuilder

    public interface MixedJsonBuilder
extends JsonBuilder
    "Partial" JSON String builder. It builds JSON string down to the given depth. Any structure below the depth is evaluated as a JSON string.

    • Method Summary
